alert.note: Alert for Chilton (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 13 at 11:21PM CDT until April 14 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 PM CDT FOR AUTAUGA...EASTERN CHILTON AND LOWNDES COUNTIES... At 1121 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Lay Lake to Higgins Ferry Park to Beechwood, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Prattville, Millbrook, Calera, Clanton, Fort Deposit, Mosses, Hayneville, Deatsville, Autaugaville, White Hall, Gordonville, Lowndesboro, Booth, Vida Junction, Beechwood, Gap Of The Mountain, Autauga County Airport, Verbena, Marbury and Lowndes County Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
